biotools.summary: Web server providing comparative microbial genomics data integrated from GenBank, RefSeq, UniProt, InterPro, Gene Ontology and the Orthologs Matrix Project (OMA) databases. Gene predictions based on 5 software packages is also displayed.

bioschemas.name: Microbe Browser
bioschemas.summary: Web server providing comparative microbial genomics data integrated from GenBank, RefSeq, UniProt, InterPro, Gene Ontology and the Orthologs Matrix Project (OMA) databases. Gene predictions based on 5 software packages is also displayed.
